prompt: make me website for gym showing different workouts and also allow user to track calories and workouts
refinedPrompt: Create a comprehensive gym website that showcases various workouts targeting different muscle groups. The site should include a user-friendly interface for tracking daily calorie intake and workout progress. Implement features such as a workout library with detailed exercise descriptions and videos, a personalized workout planner, and a nutrition guide. Incorporate a blog section with fitness tips and success stories to keep users motivated. The design should be modern, energetic, and visually appealing to attract fitness enthusiasts.
